pushbutton.label: Copy Review Actions from Primary Risk Assessment

helpgrid.innerhtml: Complete the responses for each review action. Add comments, as needed. If an icon is present against a review action, expand the row and complete the responses for the Review Items.

statictext.label: Change status to CANREQ will trigger integration.

helpgrid.innerhtml: To add the active actions in a standard action group, select the standard action group and click OK.
To find labor available during a specific date range, enter the dates in the From and To fields. To include labor who are already assigned to other jobs, select Include Fully Assigned.
This table displays a list of PMs that require alerting. Select PMs to create Work Orders.

statictext.label: Change status to SFSAPPR will trigger integration.
Change status to CANREQ will trigger integration.

dialog.label: Create Permits to Work and Isolation Certificates

helpgrid.innerhtml: Select a permit or a certificate type from either a work order or a task. Permits to work are created for each request. If separate isolation certificates are used, isolation certificates are created for the permit or certificate types that are specified as isolation certificates.

pushbutton.label: Create PTW or Isol Cert from Task

helpgrid.innerhtml: To find a crew that is available during a specific date range, enter the dates in the From and To fields. To include crews who are already assigned to other jobs, select Include Fully Assigned.

statictext.label: To trigger integration, set status to SFS.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Add one or more certificates to the current material line.

dialog.label: Current Work Order Direct Issue Materials

helpgrid.innerhtml: You can apply your changes to the current work order, or select Apply to Work Pack to change the values on the current work order and on all related records.
To find location available during a specific date range, enter the dates in the From and To fields.
This is the current Business Rules snapshot today, it is not a historical record of the Business Rules applied for the Work Order during its Workflow lifetime.

statictext.label: Change status to CANREQ will trigger integration.

helpgrid.innerhtml: The following assets and locations are safety-related assets for the current work order. Each asset might have safety hazards that affect the work environment of the current work order. Select hazards to Apply to Work Order. To finish, click Done.
